biotools.summary: XGraphBoost is a tool for extracting Graph Neural Network-based features for a better prediction of molecular properties. XGBOOST is an algorithm combining GNN and XGBOOST, which can introduce the machine learning algorithm XGBOOST under the existing GNN network architecture to improve the algorithm capability.

bioschemas.name: XGraphBoost
